ygData.subject: Re: shadowmen drops
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hunted ... luckily ... few ... I think I got lucky...my first kill dropped the mask for the robe...I havn t tried for the gloves/boots yet. :(
ygData.messageBody:
> How often do the shadowmen drop the nec items, besides the scythe? I
hunted
> them for a few hours killing at least 50 in nek last night and got a few
> scythe drops and the shadowmen item for the boots (only one though,
luckily
> the other nec i was with already had the boots). They did drop quite a
few
> shining gems and some enchanter quest stuff, but as you can see, very rare
> for other nec stuff. Does each zone spawn drop the items more frequently
> like the camp in commons drop the componant for the robe and the ones in
> innoth drop the componants for the gloves?

I think I got lucky...my first kill dropped the mask for the robe...I havn't
tried for the gloves/boots yet. :(
